languages.text: "Ты не перестаешь меня удивлять, мон-к... {name}". {n}Жуткий смех разливается по вокс-системе, словно вязкая кровь по металлическим плитам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ты не перестаешь меня удивлять, мон-к... {name}". {n}Жуткий смех разливается по вокс-системе, словно вязкая кровь по металлическим плитам.{/n}

languages.text: "You never cease to amaze, mon-k... {name}." {n}A sinister laugh oozes from the vox-system like viscous blood dripping from a metal plate.{/n}

"You never cease to amaze, mon-k... {name}." {n}An sinister laugh oozes from the vox-system like viscous blood dripping from a metal plate.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous ne cesserez jamais de me surprendre, mon-kei... {name}. » {n}Le système-vox dégouline d'un rire sinistre, épais et poisseux comme du sang gouttant sur le métal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You never cease to amaze, mon-k... {name}." {n}A sinister laugh oozes from the vox-system like viscous blood dripping from a metal plate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne cesserez jamais de me surprendre, mon-kei... {name}. » {n}Le système-vox dégouline d'un rire sinistre, épais et poisseux comme du sang gouttant sur le métal.{/n}

languages.text: “你总是让人惊奇不已，猴……{name}。”{n}音阵装置中渗出了阴险的笑声，仿佛粘稠的血液滴落在金属板上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You never cease to amaze, mon-k... {name}." {n}A sinister laugh oozes from the vox-system like viscous blood dripping from a metal plate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你总是让人惊奇不已，猴……{name}”{n}音阵装置中渗出了阴险的笑声，仿佛粘稠的血液滴落在金属板上。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr erstaunt mich immer wieder aufs Neue, Chem-P- ... {name}." {n}Ein düsteres Lauchen tropft aus dem Voxsystem wie zähflüssiges Blut, das von einer Metallplatte trieft.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You never cease to amaze, mon-k... {name}." {n}A sinister laugh oozes from the vox-system like viscous blood dripping from a metal plate.{/n}

languages.text: «Nunca deja de sorprenderme, mon-k... {name}». {n}Una risa siniestra brota del sistema de voco como si fuera sangre viscosa goteando de una placa metálica.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You never cease to amaze, mon-k... {name}." {n}A sinister laugh oozes from the vox-system like viscous blood dripping from a metal plate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nunca deja de sorprenderme, mon-k... {name}». {n}Una risa siniestra brota del sistema de voco como si fuera sangre viscosa goteando de una placa metálica.{/n}

languages.text: 「いつも驚かせてくれるな、モン＝ケ…{name}」{n}金属板からベタベタとこぼれ落ちる血のごとく、不気味な笑い声がヴォクスシステムから漏れてくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You never cease to amaze, mon-k... {name}." {n}A sinister laugh oozes from the vox-system like viscous blood dripping from a metal plate.{/n}

languages.text: "Beni etkilemeyi her seferinde başarıyorsun mon-k... {name}." {n}Voks sisteminden; metal yüzeyden damlayan yapış yapış bir kanı andıran, sinsi bir gülüş yükseliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You never cease to amaze, mon-k... {name}." {n}A sinister laugh oozes from the vox-system like viscous blood dripping from a metal plate.{/n}
